entry.title: Bvlgari Goldea The Roman Night 3 Pc gift set
entry.s:type: Eau De Pafum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bvlgari
Type: Eau De Pafum Spray
Price: 78.88

Bvlgari Goldea The Roman Night Absolute Perfume by Bvlgari, This fragrance was created by the design house of bvlgari with perfumer alberto morillas and released in 2018. A synthetic floral perfume for women. This beauty is sensual and romantic. Perfect for date night. 
The vanilla in this blend adds a silky smooth texture to an already intriguing scent. The top notes are orange blossom and black plum. The heart notes are jasmine sambac absolute and madagascan vanilla. The finishing notes are patchouli, crystallized moss and black musk
Gift Set  (2.5oz & 1/2oz SENSUAL EDP SP, Beauty Pouch)

s:variant.title: 2.5 fl oz Gift Set / Women

entry.title: Versace Yellow Diamond Gift Set By Versace
entry.s:type: Gift Set -
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Gift Set -
Price: 37.00 - 56.50 (3 variants)

Versace Yellow Diamond Perfume by Versace, One spritz of yellow diamond by versace and you'll know why they say diamonds are a girl's best friend. This lavish fragrance for women was introduced in 2011, and it's an ideal scent for wearing anytime you want to feel glamorous and sophisticated. This sensual and sultry scent opens with juicy notes of pear sorbet and lemon before revealing a floral heart of mimosa and orange blossom that is reinforced by a lush precious musk base.

Vendor: Versace

Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue Cologne by Versace, Recently launched in 2016, versace pour homme dylan blue by versace provides a delicate balance of citrus, spicy and musk accords, creating an ideal daily scent. The fragrance opens with fresh top notes of water, grapefruit, fig and bergamot. These are followed by a complex middle blend of floral and woodsy violet leaf, papyrus and patchouli mixed with spicy black pepper and ambroxan.

Versace Pour Homme Cologne by Versace, An exciting and modern twist on a classic aromatic/fougere for men, this masculine contemporary scent was created by master perfumer alberto morillas. Top notes are citruses, neroli, bergamot and petit grain; middle notes are hyacinth, clary sage, cedar and geranium; base notes are tonka bean, musk and amber.

Versace Pour Femme Dylan Blue Perfume by Versace, Versace pour femme dylan blue, created by versace, debuted in 2017. This tantalizing perfume opens with top notes granny smith apple, shiso, clover, black currant, forget-me-not and shiso for an intriguing combination that is feminine and passionate. The fruity and floral middle notes of rose, jasmine, petalia, peach and rosyfolia fuse together for a delicate, graceful aroma.

Vendor: Versace

Price: 58.44

Versace Man Cologne by Versace, The masculine scent of Versace Man Eau Fraiche will help the wearer feel charismatic, confident, sexy, and modern. Its clean, zesty smell reminds one of summer and sunshine, with the subtle hints of other woodsy notes underneath providing an “elegant understatement and a growingly alluring charm,” according to the classic design house Versace. Men, cologne enthusiasts, and fashion collectors will all be appreciative when given this as a gift.

s:variant.title: 3.3 oz (Eau Frachie) + 3.3 oz Shower Gel

Vendor: Versace
Type: Gift Set - 3.4 oz Eau De Toilette Spray + 3.4 oz Shower Gel
Price: 43.88 - 70.11 (3 variants)

Versace Eros Cologne by Versace, You'd expect nothing less than a manly fragrance from the design house of versace, and you'll get it with versace eros, a decadent fragrance for men of distinction. This woody fresh scent has a definitive oriental vibe that is daring and adventurous-just like you. It features a crisp zing of mint oil embraced by fruity green apple and italian lemon with memorable notes of geranium flowers and venezuelan ambroxan in a succulently sensuous medley that clings to your skin all day.

s:variant.title: 3.4 oz Eau De Toilette Spray + 3.4 oz Shower Gel

Unforgivable Cologne by Sean John, This special cologne was created by sean john, in 2005. The fantastic scent includes an extensive mixture of sicilian lemon, italian bergamot, green mandarin, moroccan tangerine, grapefruit, juniper leaves, birch leaves, champagne accord, mediterranean air accord, tuscan basil, florentine iris, clay sage, lavender, cashmere accord, australian sandalwood, amber, tonka bean, rum.

Tresor Perfume by Lancome, Tresor perfume by lancome is considered to be a modern classic by many fragrance critics and was composed by master perfumer sophia grojsman in 1990. Juicy peach and ripe apricot adds dimension to a rose in full bloom tinged with amber. Softly rounded with no hard edges, this is a refined and romantic fragrance for women.

Tommy Hilfiger Impact Cologne by Tommy Hilfiger, For a fresh, woody fragrance for men, you can't go wrong with tommy hilfiger impact. Introduced in 2020, this masculine fragrance is from tommy hilfiger, a fashion designer based in the us. Star Wars Darth Vader 3d Cologne by Disney, Emphasize your dark side with this smooth, sexy, sophisticated star wars darth vader 3d cologne. Shooting Stars Amber Star & Star Musk Cologne by Xerjoff, Released in 2013, shooting stars amber star & star musk encapsulates the natural wonders of the universe and throws in a touch of earthly opulence and glamour. Featured as perfume offerings in the shooting stars collection by xerjoff, this supernatural scent duo includes a creamy warmth in one flask and aristocratic-level luxury in the other. Amber star features cedar, ambergris and ylang-ylang at the top.

Sauvage Cologne by Christian Dior, Unleash your inner savage and be the alpha of the pack with sauvage by dior. This remix of the 1996 eau sauvage is a modern take of the original’s fresh, ferocious fragrance. Inspired by the fierce plains and wild open spaces of feral lands, sauvage would unleash your unruly side with its primal and breezy scent.
